remarks: Relationship between vector subtraction and addition.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvsubadd.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvsubadd.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvsubadd.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
nvsubadd $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A M B ) = C <-> ( B G C ) = A ) ) $.
